banner.description: Save the planet - give clothes a second life

footer.text: Save the planet - give clothes a second life
footer.title: Tatra Hills

index.blog_text: Want to see the blog in detail?

hero.about_us_description: Tatra Hills is a brand based on quality, environmental friendliness, and reliability. Thank to this, the tourists get comfort, and the athletes get victory. We value not only the process, but the final result as well. We appreciate the trust of those who choose us, and we also care about the planet!
hero.why_eco_description: So, why choose Recycled Clothing? In the world of fast fashion, where trends consistently come and go, a whopping 12.8 million tons of discarded clothing end up in Europe landfills every year. Our goal is to reduce clothing production as 70% of products can be reused without losing quality and functionality. Less old clothes in landfills.

about.description_1: Tatra Hills is a brand based on quality, environmental friendliness, and reliability. Thank to this, the tourists get comfort, and the athletes get victory. We value not only the process, but the final result as well. We appreciate the trust of those who choose us, and we also care about the planet!
about.description_2: Tatra Hills is not a manufacturer of sports equipment. Our brand cooperates with tourists, sportsmen, second-hands. We carefully select the goods that fall into your hands! The main task of the company is to give financial availability of high-quality equipment to the buyer while maintaining environmental friendliness.
about.description_3: Our story began 5 years ago when we crossed the boarder of Slovakia and stayed here to live. As students, we were looking for any ways to earn money. Thus, the start-up Tatra Hills was born – the resale of tourist equipment. Thanks to the careful attitude of people towards clothes, we preserve nature and help tourist to be in comfortable conditions at any time of the year.
about.abour_vlad: Hi! My name is Vlad, and I am the founder of the Tatra Hills brand. My source of inspiration has been nature for more than 15 years and this is me through whom the whole entire product you receive passes.
about.abour_daria: And this is Daria, the co-founder of Tatra Hills and my assistant. Also, she is the main engine of all content processes. The final result that our clients receive is thanks to Daria.
